name: Cat vs Dog (Nanxiang Wang)
description:
2-player competitive game in which a friendly dog tries to catch up to and cuddle a cute cat, while the cat tries to keep away from the annoying dog.

Controls:
Dog: WASD for movement, Tab to catch cat.
Cat: Arrow Keys for movement, Space to use your leaf blower to push the dog away.
Press Enter at the end of a round to restart.

Team:
Dennis Zabluda - Programming
Linda Li - 2D Artist/Animator
Nanxiang Wang - 2D Artist/Animator
Sawyer Porte - Programming, Sound Design, Level Design
TsungHan Yang - Background Artist, Splash Art
